Date: 2025-08-11 20:58
Subject: RSO UAE - NEW STORE OPENING | Make Up For Ever  - Yas Mall
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All, 

 

It is our pleasure to announce the opening of Make Up For Ever  - Yas Mall

 

The boutique team started welcoming its Guests on the 09st Aug 2025 at 10am.

 

Another amazing teamwork from all team members involved in this project.

 

Thank you All for making this project a success & Wishing record sales to the  Make Up For Ever  - Yas Mall !

 

All the best, 

Retail Operations
